label: Bitten by
description: What is the insect that bit me?
cred_description: Mosquitoes are quite common at this moment of the year, the other insects are more rare.

label: Stinger left
description: Is there a stinger left in my skin?
cred_description: Mosquitoes don't normally leave anything in the skin when they bite.
Bees can generally leave their stinger in the skin, and normally die after that.
Wasps use their stinger for hunting, and don't lose it when using it.

label: Swelling
description: Is there a swelling on my skin?
cred_description: Mosquito bites may cause some very small swelling, but it's rarely notable.
Spider bites often cause some notable swelling.
Bee stings are not rarely accompanied by some swelling.
Wasp sting can cause some notable swelling for some persons.

label: Pain
cred_description: Some spider bites may hurt, other not.
Been stings do hurt quite a lot.
Wasp stings do hurt as well.

label: Itchy
cred_description: Spider bites are often itchy as well.
Bee stings are not really itchy in general.
